headline: Invesco Ltd. Announces February 28, 2025 Assets Under Management
summary: Invesco Ltd. (NYSE: IVZ)1 today reported preliminary month-end assets under management (AUM) of $1,888.6 billion, a decrease of 0.7% versus previous month-end. The firm delivered net long-term inflows of $6.0 billion in the month. Non-management fee earning net inflows were $4.4 billion and money market net outflows were $7.1 billion. AUM was negatively impacted by unfavorable market returns which decreased AUM by $20 billion. FX increased AUM by $2.0 billion. Preliminary average total AUM for t

headline: Invesco Global Core Equity Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Global equity returns were mixed in the fourth quarter, with developed equities outperforming emerging market equities.
